attributes.action: Sack Brian Barwick and sort out the England team once and for all.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Since England have failed to Qualify for Euro 2008 the FA have sacked Steve McClaren. The FA Management team should also quit for there poor performance in England Staff selection, Starting with Brian Barwick.
The English team have become a laughing stock, the revenue that will be lost next year because of there incompetence is immeasurable.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
